summary: A short quest of love, betrayal, and revenge.  Afterword, enjoy the company of two custom-voiced Bosmer followers.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff0000][size=4]THIS WAS MY FIRST QUEST MOD, A LEARNING EXERCISE.
I AM NO LONGER WORKING ON IT, THEREFORE NO SUPPORT.
THE QUEST WILL BE BROUGHT INTO ANNA NPCS.[/size][/color][/center]

[size=+1][color=#ffcc00][b]Love's Labors Avenged[/b][/color][/size]
This quest is fully voiced! A short adventure of love, betrayal, and revenge.

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=103666643]Steam version here[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26311]Polish translation here[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=rHsu3xBW0Y4]Video Walkthrough here[/url]

[size=+1][color=#ffcc00][b]The Quest[/b][/color][/size]
Meet a Wood Elf in Solitude's Winking Skeever, and find out what brought him to Skyrim. If you offer to help him in his quest, he will accompany you. The quest will lead you to the source of a mysterious message, a story of unrequited love turned to scorn and revenge. Uncover the truth and bring peace to a grieving widow.

[size=+1][color=#ffcc00][b]The Companion[/b][/color][/size]
Andario is a romantic, a rogue, and a lover of good stories. He has his own view on things; you can read his journal on a back table in the Winking Skeever. He is a leveled potential follower skilled in Archery, One-Hand, Light Armor, Sneak, and Destruction, with several perks with each skill. During the quest, he has stage-specific dialogue, so talk to him often :)

Ysandir has special dialog if you are in the Thieves Guild.

At the end of this quest, match your skills against a leveled Wood Elf battle-mage, skilled in One-Hand, Heavy Armor, Restoration, and Destruction. He also has a journal on the round table, where you can read his ruminations.

[size=+1][color=#ffcc00][b]The Cave[/b][/color][/size]
You'll explore a small cave system with underground waterfalls, enemies, and ingredients to harvest. The cave, however, is NOT big on traps or tons of natural, "rubbly" things, as those were not my priority. I preferred to focus more on creating a story, scenes, and connecting it all with scripting. You'll find the cave marked on the map. It is fully hand-Navmeshed and Nav-tested.

[size=+1][color=#ffcc00][b]Issues[/b][/color][/size]
- due to stupid CK, Andario may have a gray face. I'll try to fix that soon. You can fix in CK by typing "Andario" in the object window and filter by actor. Highlight his name, hit Ctrl + F4, then Yes, then Done.

[size=+1][color=#ffcc00][b]Mod Credits[/b][/color][/size]
Apachii for [url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Apachii Skyhair[/url]
Nevenbridges81 for [url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3589]Natural Eyes[/url] used for Andario
Lograam for [url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]Eyes of Beauty[/url] (not actually used in Esp, but two eye textures are included in bsa for options)

[size=+1][color=#ffcc00][b]Voice Credits[/b][/color][/size]
Thynar - Andario
Anduniel (me) - Ysandir, Teralyn
Erebus Red - Haldwyn

Big Thanks To:
-------------------
Thynar - for tons of help with quest stuff, scripting, testing, and giving life to my hero
Erebus Red - for voicing my villain, testing, and script advice
You both did an awesome job!
Doughamil - for his inspiring and informative tutorials
author: Anduniel
